author: billbarker
msg: Include all of o.a.t.u.compat in bootstrap.jar.
Without this, Tomcat can't access any of the features of a 1.4.x JVM.

author: remm
msg: - Some tweaking for use with the Java in-process protocol handler (at last someone
- Since this is in-process, forcing to pass the URI as a byte array is stupid, since the
conversion is fairly expensive, and more importantly, it would add a lot of complexity

author: remm
msg: - Experiment with stopping the manager earlier, so that listeners are still present.
